General.Name: Teo Seng Capital Bhd
General.Description: Teo Seng Capital Berhad, an investment holding company, primarily engages in poultry farming business in Malaysia, Singapore, and internationally. It operates through two segments, Poultry, and Trading and Others. The company produces and distributes eggs, paper egg trays, animal health products, paper egg trays, and animal feeds. It is also involved in the wholesale, import, and export of egg products; and distribution of pet foods, medicines, and other animal health related products. In addition, the company offers management and cold room services; and rents factory spaces. Further, it engages in the agriculture and fertilizer by-product business. The company was founded in 1978 and is headquartered in Yong Peng, Malaysia. Teo Seng Capital Berhad operates as a subsidiary of Advantage Valuations Sdn. Bhd.
